name: Line Link
description:
************************Gameplay************************

In the level, you need to freely choose a marker point as your starting point, and plan a line based on this starting point. This line needs to contain all the markers in the level

*************************Game Control************************

Click the mouse, select or connect the direction with the left mouse button, and cancel the operation with the right button

*************************Game Features************************

>> Easy to learn, simple mouse controls

>>Very suitable for relaxing yourself after a heavy game

>> Some logical thinking challenge, but not overly complicated

>>The puzzles in the level have multiple solutions

*I used google translate, hope you can understand what I want to express
